name: The frictionful Life of a Finger
name_original: The frictionful Life of a Finger
description:
A game we made for LÖVE Jam 2019

Life can be so much more complicated than necessary! Sometimes you just want to go see a conference, but you can't find your ticket. Maybe it's at the bottom of your bag...

Use friction to navigate your bag and find your ticket so life can become simple again.

Assets credits

    • Haunted by MelloHarmony https://www.jamendo.com/track/1240663/haunted

    • "Crowd Waiting to Board Toronto Island Ferry" by jakobthiesen (re-encoded) https://freesound.org/s/102410/
    • "Dun dun dun" by Simon_Lacelle (re-encoded) https://freesound.org/s/45654/
    • "VICTORY CRY REVERB 2" by chripei (re-encoded) https://freesound.org/s/165491/
